page.title: 04Bradfield's Roads
page.content: The roads in our area are all minor roads.They are between 3 metres and 5 metres wide.Many have twists and turns.Most of them are steep.Some have a gradient of 1 in 5.Quite a lot of them have a gradient between 1 in 7 and 1 in 5.There are no pavements . Some roads have grassy verges, other roads are bordered by stone walls and/or drainage ditches. In many places there is only enough room for one vehicle and because it is bendy it can be dangerous if you go too fast. You also need to be careful because tractors pulling farm machinery use the roads.
